FPGA-Based Security

Unbreakable FPGA-Based Data Diode Technology

Secure, Tamper-Proof, and 100% Unidirectional Data Flow.

Hardware-Enforced Security

Our FPGA-based data diode technology ensures 100% unidirectional data flow, making it physically impossible for data to travel in the reverse direction.

Technology Overview

Our FPGA-based data diode technology ensures absolute security by enforcing unidirectional data flow at the hardware level.

Why FPGA-Based Solutions Are Superior

Unlike software-based security solutions susceptible to vulnerabilities and misconfigurations, our FPGA (Field-Programmable Gate Array) technology provides hardware-enforced security, eliminating potential software exploits.

Hardware-Enforced Security

The hardware architecture physically enforces security, making it impervious to software-based attacks and configuration errors.

Tamper-Proof Design

Our design ensures that any tampering attempts are immediately detected, maintaining data integrity at all times.

Elimination of IP Stack Vulnerabilities

By removing the traditional IP stack, we significantly reduce the attack surface, creating a solution that is inherently secure.

Data Flow Architecture

Secure Zone (Source)
FPGA Hardware Barrier
Protected Zone (Destination)

Key Features & Benefits

Our FPGA-based data diode technology offers unparalleled security features and benefits for protecting critical infrastructure.

100% Unidirectional Data Transfer

Ensures data flows only in the intended direction, preventing data leakage and unauthorized access.

Absence of IP Stack

Eliminating the IP stack removes common attack vectors, enhancing the system's inherent security.

Low Latency, High Throughput

Our hardware-based solution delivers exceptional performance with minimal latency and high data throughput, suitable for demanding applications.

Compliance with Stringent Standards

Meets the highest government and industry security standards for protecting critical infrastructure and sensitive data.

Flexible Integration

Easily integrates with existing infrastructures and supports various protocols and data formats for seamless deployment.

Explore how our FPGA-based data diode technology stands out compared to other market solutions.

Hardware vs. Software Solutions

FPGA-based hardware solutions offer security guarantees that software solutions can't match.

  • Physical enforcement of unidirectional data flow
  • Immune to software vulnerabilities and exploits
  • Elimination of configuration errors

Performance Considerations

Our FPGA technology delivers superior performance metrics compared to competitors.

  • Lower latency for time-sensitive applications
  • Higher throughput for data-intensive operations
  • Consistent performance under varying loads

Compliance & Certification

Our solution meets the most stringent regulatory requirements for critical infrastructure.

  • Compliance with government security standards
  • Possession of industry-specific certifications
  • Subjected to regular security assessments and validations

Deployment & Integration

Our solution offers simpler deployment compared to many competitors.

  • Faster implementation timelines
  • Reduced configuration complexity
  • Broad compatibility with existing systems
